repl_description:
A static clone of pflegewiki.eu focused on Pflegeberatung content, featuring a responsive design and comprehensive navigation system. The repository implements static page generation for care consultation content with advanced search capabilities.

Implemented features:
- Static page generation
- Navigation with home functionality
- Advanced search system (real-time suggestions, category filtering, relevance sorting)
- Search result highlighting and history tracking
- Responsive layout design
- Article table of contents integration
